Dears,

Good day ,

 

 

Please find attached updated statement of account for your review, update your records and settle the outstanding balance. 

 

 

 

Should you require clarifications in this regard, please do not hesitate to directly contact us and if you have recently settled the above outstanding balance, please share the bank receipt with us and disregard this email.

 

 

 

Thanks & Regards ,,

 

Rami Al Najjar

Finance Dept.
